xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content: #if($request.confirm=="1") #set($lmng = $xwiki.getPlugin("licence_manager")) $lmng.addLicence("Curriki License", true) $lmng.addLicence("Public Domain", true) $lmng.addLicence("Gnu Documentation License", false) $lmng.addLicence("Creative Commons Attribution Sharealike", false) $lmng.addLicence("Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial", false) $lmng.addLicence("Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial Share Alike", false) $lmng.addLicence("Creative Commons Attribution No Derivatives", false) $lmng.addLicence("Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial No Derivatives", false) $lmng.getNotCompatibleLicences() $lmng.getCompatibleLicences() #end
